snippet: First lady Michelle Obama has switched her plans to address a high school commencement ceremony in Topeka, Kansas, in May after students protested that her presence would limit the number of family members they could invite to the ceremony....

headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama Changes Kansas Speech Date After Students Protest
headline.main: Michelle Obama Changes Kansas Speech Date After Students Protest

lead_paragraph: First lady Michelle Obama has switched her plans to address a high school commencement ceremony in Topeka, Kansas, in May after students protested that her presence would limit the number of family members they could invite to the ceremony.
